GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

endpoints.GET /api/topics: serves an array of all topics
endpoints.GET api/articles: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/article_id.description: serves an array of article with matching article id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments corresponding to article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds new comment to database and serves new comment

comment.body: My hovercraft is full of eels.
comment.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: amends votes on article with corresponding article_id and serves updated article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge
